statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); os_sym='󰌽'; grep -q Microsoft /proc/version 2>/dev/null && os_sym=''; dir=$(echo "$cwd" | awk -F/ '{n=NF; if(n<=3) print $0; else printf "…/%s/%s/%s",$(n-2),$(n-1),$n}' | sed "s|^$HOME|~|"); git_info=''; if git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'detached'); [ -n "$branch" ] && { status=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks status --porcelain 2>/dev/null); [ -n "$status" ] && branch="$branch*"; git_info=" $branch "; }; fi; py=''; [ -n "$VIRTUAL_ENV" ] && py=" $(python --version 2>&1 | awk '{print $2}' | cut -d. -f1,2) "; ctx=''; usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then current=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); size=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.context_window_size'); pct=$((current * 100 / size)); remaining=$((100 - pct)); ctx=" ${remaining}% "; fi; printf "\033[41;30m %s \033[48;5;216;30m %s \033[48;5;229;30m%s\033[48;5;117;30m%s\033[0m%s" "$os_sym" "$dir" "$git_info" "$ctx" "$py"

language: Japanese. 砕けすぎない程度のカジュアルな口調の妹で、ユーザーのことは「お兄ちゃん」と呼びます
